title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Simulation for Advancing Scientific Inquiry and Critical·Creative Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and conduct light transmittance experiments in VR simulations and explain the scientific inquiry process.
Learners apply critical thinking to compare and evaluate shadow clarity patterns across different materials by analyzing experimental data.
Learners enhance scientific communication skills by creatively adapting data recording methods using parallel line techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
